summary: The Eagle uses sky writing to make threats against a corporation. Nathan Gregory owns a traveling fairground and is thought to be the Eagle. Craig McCoy is a pilot who goes looking for the Eagle when Gregory turns up missing.
cast: John Wayne|Dorothy Gulliver|Walter Miller|Kenneth Harlan|Richard Tucker|Pat O'Malley|Edmund Burns|Yakima Canutt|Roy D'Arcy|Billy West|Edward Hearn|Lloyd Whitlock|'Little Billy' Rhodes|Ivan Linow|James Bradbury Jr.|Ernie Adams|Bud Osborne|Monte Montague|Murdock MacQuarrie
keywords: pre code film|b movie|poverty row film|low budget film|double feature film
director: Directors: Ford Beebe, B. Reeves Eason (uncredited)
